title: Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site: The King Center
body: The King Center         The Martin Luther King, Jr. Center for Nonviolent Social Change, Inc.   Mrs. Coretta Scott King established The Martin Luther King, Jr. Center for Nonviolent Social Change, Inc. in 1968 to preserve the legacy of her husband. While at The King Center visit the final resting place of Dr. King, Jr. and exhibits on him, Coretta Scott King, and Mahatma Gandhi.
